description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission P091641 (dated 11/11/2009) for retention of basement, ground and first floors as offices (B1), change of use of the second floor to residential (one x 1-bed flat and (two x 2 bed flats); new third floor for residential use (one x 1 bed flat and two x 2 bed flats). The minor material amendments are:
- for third floor cut-back/reduction in mass in centre of mansard extension 
- revised arrangement of residential units to second and third floors to provide two x 1 bed flats, two x 2 bed flats and two x 2-bed maisonettes
- revisions to means of escape including removal of one fire escape
decision_conditions: REASON:  The reconfiguration of the flats (resulting in a change to the description of development), alterations to the mass of the building (through removal of stair cores, lift over-runs, plant room and balustrade), external alterations (including changes to the roof, means of residential access to the building and the introduction of pitched roofs to third and second floors) and  the alterations to the means of escape,  when considered in the context of planning permission P091641, result in material alterations to the building.
